abstract: Glencore Xstrata has named Morgan Stanley’s former chief executive, John J. Mack, and the executive chairman of Bloomberg L.P., Peter T. Grauer, as nonexecutive directors to its board.
snippet: Glencore Xstrata has named Morgan Stanley’s former chief executive, John J. Mack, and the executive chairman of Bloomberg L.P., Peter T. Grauer, as nonexecutive directors to its board.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – Glencore Xstrata has named John J. Mack, a former chief executive of Morgan Stanley, and Peter T. Grauer, executive chairman of information provider Bloomberg L.P., as nonexecutive directors to its board.

headline.main: Glencore Xstrata Names Mack to Its Board
